long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gmail Notifier Lite is a convenient and practical Google Chrome extension designed to help users monitor multiple Gmail accounts for incoming mail. With no need to switch to respective Gmail webpages manually, this plugin provides email notifications directly on the browser's icon.

Whether you are an individual user or a business professional, this plugin greatly enhances your Gmail experience in terms of efficiency. Here are the key features of Gmail Notifier Lite:

Multi-Account Monitoring: Easily add and manage multiple Google accounts, keeping track of new mail for each account.

Real-Time Notifications: Instantly receive notifications on the browser icon, ensuring that you never miss any important messages.
